data.Name: Noga Erez
data.Bio: Noga Erez is an Israeli musician, singer-songwriter, keyboardist and producer. Born and living just outside Tel Aviv, multi-instrumentalist Erez’s grainy textures and potent atmospheres forged with her synths and ingenious beats bravely straddle genres, energized further by the environment in which she’s grown up. While the music she makes in collaboration with her partner and co-writer, composer and producer Ori Rousso exploits many of the more physical dynamic elements of electronic music Read more on Last.fm

data.Name: Noga Erez
